title: fix(ui): add cursor-pointer to select all buttons
author: fisventurous

gist.summary: Added the standard pointer cursor to 'Select all' and category toggle buttons in the model permissions settings.
gist.impact: Improves the user interface by clearly indicating which elements are clickable in the permissions menu.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee holding a giant pixelated mouse cursor over a chunky 'Select All' button. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi UI elements. Emotionally warm, polished vibes.
